member_organisations: Stowarzyszenie Międzynarodowa Komisja Praw Człowieka z Ukrainy
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Borders and Security, Communication, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives:
IHRC confirms that it is actively working, to direct influencing EU policies on according to Article 7 of the Register on the following issues : 
 
-migration policies, respect of human rights and European integration policies; 
 
- direct interaction with EU- MPs, on legislative proposals aimed to strengthen the respect of human rights for migrants and European Integration 
  
ii) performing activity of indirect influencing of the European Policies, organizing periodic meetings and Conferences, including high level meetings, especially in the sector of : 
-Migrations,  
-Refugee Assistance and  
-Assistance Cooperation with non EU Countries  
 
The Logo of the International Human Rights Commission has been registered as European Trade mark N. 017950468 with European Intellectual Property Office (EUIPO) in date 05/09/2018 with Owner ID number 949182
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: United Nations Global Marketplace - UNGM Nr.557559
goals__remit: To actively work in international field for fostering the respect of Human Rights and their promotion both at National,Regional, Subregional and Gobal level, by organizing a wide series of activities, for advocating to the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and its actual application in National Legislative Systems. Highest relevance is given to: Migration Policies and the Rights of Migrants; EU integration policies especially for Non-EU Eastern Countries; Respect of Peace and Dialogue among Nations; Monitoring of Electoral Systems and legislative decision-making process in EU, as well Eastern Countries and African Countries and National welfare systems and respect of Human Rights
relevant_communication:
IHRC organizes public events aiming to indirect influencing EU legislative policies such  as: 
 
1) The International Conference IHRC in London on  Regional (EU) Systems of Protection of Human Rights 70 Years after Proclamation of Universal Declaration of Human Rights 
 
2) The International Conference IHRC in Poland, on EU Integration and Respect of Human Rights
